summary: Diff adds favicon and apple-touch-icon <link> tags to frontend/index.html, but does not add the required image assets under frontend/public/assets/generated/. Several unrelated UI, styling, query behavior, and config changes appear to have been made beyond the favicon request.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the favicon image files as static assets in the frontend so they are included in the build output and can be referenced directly from `frontend/index.html`.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows no new files added, and there is no evidence that the required PNG files were created under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` (only references to them were added in HTML).

hallucinated_features.description: Changed global UI styling/color tokens to use #cde5aa and white; removed borders around the site.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-2/REQ-3 (favicon support/assets only).

hallucinated_features.description: JoinScreen onboarding changes (avatar preview removed, enhanced error handling/alerts).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested as part of favicon work.

hallucinated_features.description: Chat/Message avatar color behavior changes (letter avatars forced to #cde5aa background and white text; default usernameColor updated).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested as part of favicon work.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend query hook behavior changes: enhanced error categorization in useCreateUser and automatic message refresh every 1.5 seconds.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; also may conflict with constraint of no backend state changes (even if client-only, it is unrelated to favicon).

hallucinated_features.description: GIF picker improvements and GIPHY API integration changes, including updating the GIPHY API key.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested as part of favicon work.

hallucinated_features.description: Emoji picker functionality for uploading/browsing/selecting custom emojis with styling updates.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested as part of favicon work.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated HTML document title to "Dini GC".
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on adding a favicon; changing the tab title was not included in REQ-2/REQ-3.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified project_state.json (project metadata/new feature requests tracking).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; also not a frontend runtime change required for favicon behavior.
